This repo has three introductory R examples:

1. a [Quarto notebook](https://jimurick.github.io/vermont/examples/quarto/quarto_example.html) ([code folder](examples/quarto)),
2. a [Quarto webpage](https://jimurick.github.io/vermont/), and
3. a [Shiny app](https://jimurick.shinyapps.io/HospitalStarRatings/) ([code folder](examples/shiny)).

See the [Quarto webpage](https://jimurick.github.io/vermont/) for more detail.
